QUERY.TITLE: Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease
QUERY.DESC: Find documents describing symptoms of any variant of the Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease or reports that link CJD to Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy ( BSE ) , otherwise known as the mad-cow disease .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents will describe the symptoms of subjects suspected or diagnosed as having the Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease or will focus_on reported links between CJD and BSE , otherwise known as the mad-cow disease .
